roleset.name: become friends with
roleset.note: BEFRIEND-V NOTES: Frames file for 'befriend' based on sentences in wsj. No access to Verbnet at the moment. (from befriend.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: the one example
example.text: The U.S. has befriended [*-2] and later turned against [many dictators, but none quite so resourceful]-*2.
